alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gove County through 700 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Park, or 6 miles west of Quinter, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quinter. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 96 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds associated with this storm may result in areas of reduced visibility associated with blowing dust. This includes Interstate 70 from Grainfield east to Quinter and Collyer. Use extreme caution if you must travel and be alert for rapidly changing visibility.
